Oracle of Harmony.reads: Portfolio waveform coherence, solfeggio alignment, PHI resonance, wave phase

Oracle of Time.reads: Market session timing, day-of-week patterns, dream engine prophecies, trade history momentum

architecture.all_seeing_eye: Combines all 5 Oracle scores using weighted averaging with confidence adjustment
architecture.prophecy_engine: Three-pillar consensus between Queen (confidence), King (health), Seer (coherence)

consensus_actions.STRONG_BUY: All three pillars aligned above 0.75 - deploy with confidence
consensus_actions.HOLD: Alignment 0.45-0.60 - maintain positions, limit new entries
consensus_actions.HALT: Any pillar critical OR alignment below 0.15 - stop all trading
